Templates.name: sap.fe.templates.ExtensionAPI.editFlow.invokeAction
Templates.helpDescription: Invokes a bound or unbound action.

Templates.name: sap.fe.templates.ExtensionAPI.editFlow.securedExecution
Templates.helpDescription: Secured execution of the given function. Ensures that the function is only executed when certain conditions are fulfilled.

Templates.name: sap.fe.templates.ExtensionAPI.loadFragment
Templates.helpDescription: Load a fragment and go through the template preprocessor with the current page context.
